TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GroupPrincipal extends System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal

span.span: Encapsulates group accounts.

summary.span: 群組帳戶可以是主體物件的任意集合，或針對管理目的建立的帳戶。

span.span: Group accounts can be arbitrary collections of principal objects or accounts created for administrative purposes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立時，不會保存的群組主體的帳戶。The group principal account is not persisted when it is created. 若要保留帳戶，請呼叫方法。To persist the account, call the method.

summary.span: 傳回包含在群組中的主體物件之集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of the principal objects that is contained in the group.
System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement Namespace Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1<class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal> GetMembers() cil managed
Public Function GetMembers () As PrincipalSearchResult(Of Principal)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 傳回包含在群組中的主體物件之集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of the principal objects that is contained in the group.

returns.span: 物件，包含是群組成員的主體物件，如果群組沒有成員則為空集合。

span.span: A object that contains the principal objects that are members of the group, or an empty collection if the group has no members.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不會搜尋目前的群組以遞迴方式。This method does not search the current group recursively. 因此，群組物件可能會傳回主體物件集合中。Therefore, group objects may be returned in the principal object collection. 成員會傳回哪內容。Members are returned without respect to the context. 比方說，如果 AD DS 內容以在"CN = SpecialUsers，DC = Fabrikam，DC = com"，PrincipalFindResult 集將包含位於下的群組成員 「 CN = NormalUsers，DC = Fabrikam，DC = com"也，即使它們屬於不是範圍的一部分搜尋的內容。For example, if an AD DS context based at "CN=SpecialUsers,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com", the PrincipalFindResult set will include group members that are located under "CN=NormalUsers,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com" also, even though they fall under a scope that is not part of the context that is searched. 傳回主體集合也可以包含位於不同的存放區與群組的成員。The returned principal collection may also contain members that are located in a different store than the group.

span.span: System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement Namespace Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1<class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal> GetMembers(bool recursive) cil managed
Public Function GetMembers (recursive As Boolean) As PrincipalSearchResult(Of Principal)

param.name: recursive
param.span: 指定是否會遞迴地搜尋群組的布林值。

span.span: A Boolean value that specifies whether the group is searched recursively.

summary.span: 傳回包含在群組中的主體物件之集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of the principal objects that is contained in the group.

summary.span: 當遞迴旗標設為 true 時，這個方法會遞迴地搜尋目前群組，並且傳回所有巢狀群組成員。

span.span: When the recursive flag is set to true, this method searches the current group recursively and returns all nested group members.

returns.span: 物件，包含是群組成員的主體物件，如果群組沒有成員則為空集合。

span.span: A object that contains the principal objects that are members of the group, or an empty collection if the group has no members.

public: property Nullable<System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::GroupScope> GroupScope { Nullable<System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::GroupScope> get(); void set(Nullable<System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::GroupScope> value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定可為 Null 之 列舉型別，這個列舉型別指定此群組主體的範圍。

span.span: Gets or sets a Nullable enumeration that specifies the scope for this group principal.

value.span: 可為 Null 之 列舉值，這個列舉值指定此群組的範圍，如果未設定範圍則為 null。

span.span: A nullable enumeration value that specifies the scope of this group or null if no scope has been set.

exception.span: 應用程式可能無法將這個屬性 (Property) 設定為 null。

span.span: The application may not set this property to null.
System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement Namespace Overview

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property IsSecurityGroup As Nullable(Of Boolean)
public: property Nullable<bool> IsSecurityGroup { Nullable<bool> get(); void set(Nullable<bool> value); };
member this.IsSecurityGroup : Nullable<bool> with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定可為 Null 的布林值，這個布林值指出群組是否已啟用安全性。

span.span: Gets or sets a Nullable Boolean value that indicates whether the group is security-enabled.

value.span: 如果群組已啟用安全性則為 ，如果群組未受到保存則為 null，否則為 。

span.span: if the group is security enabled, or null if the group has not been persisted; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性會傳回 false 時，群組是暫時不安全性功能。When this property returns false, the group is temporarily not security-enabled. 當屬性重設為 true 之後，群組會有相同的屬性，因為之前將它設定為 false。When the property is reset to true later, the group will have the same properties as before it was set to false. 主體尚未保存在存放區中，如果這個屬性會傳回 null。If the principal has not been persisted in the store, this property returns null. 保存主體之後，預設已啟用安全性的設定將取決於存放區中。After the principal is persisted, the default security-enabled setting depends on the store. 在 AD DS 與 AD LDS 存放區時停用新的主體會保存這些，而 SAM 會時它們會保存，可讓新的主體。The AD DS and AD LDS stores disable new principals when they are persisted, whereas SAM enables new principals when they are persisted.

exception.span: 應用程式可能無法將這個屬性 (Property) 設定為 null。

span.span: The application may not set this property to null.
System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement Namespace Overview
